titleStmt.title: A true and reall manifestation of endeared and unfeigned loue flowing through a brother from the endless life, unto the scattered (yet united) flock who are of the seed royall
titleStmt.author: Batt, Jasper, d. 1702.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
